Text: Awesome! Where do you get the TS (raw) from? I'm an encoder myself and I can help you if you'd like. Otherwise I would still like to be able to get my hands on a raw if I could :D
hey, i downloaded and it wont play through windows media player at all and in vlc it plays without sound any suggestions

Its much different than original series but still very good.

Audio 10/10

Ran into a problem with the file itself though... the entire directory would crash windows explorer. I had to delete the file through command prompt. Anyone else run into this problem?
